about_the_game:
Elementia: A Legendary Tower Defense Adventure in an Enchanting World!



Elementia is a rogue-lite tower defense game set in a fantastic world. Each nation is represented by unique elements, and you manage your inventory with items based on these elements, crafting runes to build your towers!

Build Your Towers with Runes


Combine runes representing the unique elements of each nation to build towers and place them on the paths where enemies will pass, eliminating chaos enemies from your world. You have 23 unique tower options for each rune you combine!

Make Strategic Decisions


Each element has its unique properties. Add towers with elements capable of breaking enemy resistances to your deck and make strategic decisions to win the battle. Attacking the right enemy with the right elements will make your progress easier, but using the wrong elements can delay victory or lead to complete defeat.

Unique Battle Arenas


Deploy your towers in the right areas and start the battle by selecting the necessary ones from the towers you have previously built. Remember, each arena is different; every battle requires a new strategy.

Unimaginable Effects


Try to develop the right strategy among hundreds of different towers to defeat the enemies. Both enemies and towers are ready to surprise you!

short_description: Elementia is a strategy-focused rogue-lite tower defense game set in a fantastic universe. In a world where warring nations have suddenly formed an alliance against a common enemy, you will defend your nation and develop strategies for victory. Defeat your enemies and become a hero!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish
